summary: The client raised concerns about US-010 not being fully testable without dependencies, and Mike proposed a minimal sprint SP-003 to integrate US-010 with US-001 and possibly US-016 for a complete login-to-dashboard flow.

decisions.title: Propose SP-003 for integration
decisions.details: Re-execute US-010 and US-001 with optional US-016 to ensure testable end-to-end flow from login to employee directory search.

actions.task: Save the sprint SP-003 and update story statuses once approved

backlog_deltas.title: Minimal Login-to-Dashboard Integration sprint including US-010, US-001, and US-016 if needed

risks.risk: Incomplete test data leading to empty search results on dashboard
risks.mitigation: Run US-016 setup script to seed SQLite DB with dummy employee profiles

risks.risk: Missing route integration causing redirect errors
risks.mitigation: Verify /dashboard route renders US-001's search UI during re-execution
